Articles.Content:
What do Kerbals do in their time off?

Everyone post your pics of Kerbal's chilling out here!

Here's some Kerbals hanging out at Club Kerbo, listening to Ed Kerman's comedy routine:

How do you organise a party in space?

You Planet!
Hah! Good idea, IÃ‚Â´m quite curious to see where this leads. I enjoyed the corny pun.
You need to roll that off the launch pad with some giant wheels and keep it there.
No, what you REALLY need to do is put that thing on the mun. The first interplanetary comedy club off kerbin!

this just needs artificial gravity in orbit and it could be....wait for it....

a space bar![badum tiss]

this just needs artificial gravity in orbit and it could be....wait for it....

a space bar![badum tiss]

Aha! That's pretty good, made me laugh.

To the OP: I like it, did it take long to build?
